Package com.metattri.dao

Class DB

java.lang.Object
com.metattri.dao.DB
public class DB extends Object
This class encapsulates the data access operations for Student objects, including reading, modifying, and writing methods involving Student.json files.

      public static com.google.gson.JsonArray exportStudent(Student student)
      Exports a Student object as a JsonArray.

      Returns:

    • deleteProject

      public static com.google.gson.JsonArray deleteProject(String name, String time)
      Deletes a project from the student's records.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the project to delete.
      time - The time of the project to delete.
      Returns:
      An array of student objects after deleting the project.

      Deletes a honor from the student's records.
      Parameters:
      honor_name - The name of the honor to delete.
      honor_time - The time of the honor to delete.
      Returns:

      public static com.google.gson.JsonArray updateStudent(Student student)
      Updates a student object and converts it into a JsonArray for writing to the JSON file.
      Parameters:
      student - The modified student object.
      Returns:
      A JsonArray representing the updated student objects.
